title: Dice Game
description: A fun and simple web-based Dice Game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Test your luck by selecting a number and rolling the dice!

title: Wellness Session App
description: A full-stack wellness session management platform built with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It allows users to create, save as draft, and publish wellness sessions.

title: Gemini Clone
description: A front-end clone of Google's Gemini chat interface built using React, Vite, and CSS. This project is designed to replicate Gemini's elegant layout and user experience.
